ItemValueShopTorrTourneyErrantryFarmEvent
Silver5000-YYY--
Gold10000-YYY--
Platinum30000-YYY--


When Torr comes by the ranch and offers you one of these items, he generally sells it to you for half its value. It's instant profit for you to buy it from him.
